channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Zoo Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Zoo Management System

item.title: CVE-2022-1816|2024-10-15T17:13:17.850Z -- unspecified -- zoo%20management%20system
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found in Zoo Management System 1.0. Affected by this issue is /zoo/admin/public_html/view_accounts?type=zookeeper of the content module. The manipulation of the argument admin_name with the input <script>alert(1)</script> leads to an authenticated cross site scripting. Exploit details have been disclosed to the public.
